properties.name: jwt.expiration.time
properties.description: We cannot have jwt's that do not expire, so they expire after 15 minutes of inactivity on our site

properties.name: STRIPE_PUBLIC_TEST_KEY
properties.description: This is the key we should receive from the Front End

properties.name: STRIPE_SECRET_TEST_KEY
properties.description: Like the name implies, do not share this key with anyone or put it in our version control system, git.
